name: Skelly (LawdGawdSky)
description:
Follow Skelly, a skeleton who just so happens to be roaming around. 

This is an RPG project made to test how far I can make a role playing game and mix voxel art. This is a year old project and I do not think I will continue it anymore. So thought to let you guys enjoy it.  Hope you enjoy the  idea of the game.

Instructions:

  • Arrow keys = Move
  • Z  = Attack
  • X = Interact
  • CTRL = Dash
